description: It works as a tether, but I wouldn't suggest using it in a production setting. There's no live preview of the photo before hand and when it does show a picture, the colors are messed up. The whites turn red if it's over exposed or blue if it's under.
sadly it isn't designed to work with the embedded laptop camera
works with eos 5d mk4, connection breaks often due to trying to OS mount it as mass storage, liveview crashes on it's own quite a bit
The developer has put a lot of thought into making this tethering app simple to use and feature rich.

Okay 1st off this application was very easy to install and right off the installation it opens up quickly. After connecting my Canon Rebel T7 the program let me know that my camera was mounted as a filesystem and that it would have to unmount it to operate correctly, I agreed and let it do its magic. Having this on my laptop is a lifesaver because I can set up this along with my camera and do my photoshoots, and not have to look at the small screen on my camera. Also I can save all my shots to my external SSD and edit them in Lightroom on my Mac. Flawless. Thank you. This is a well developed app and I pray that this keeps being maintained!
summary: Works With the Canon Rebel T7

description: Works great with Sony A7 II
Could the version be updated to0 version 3.0?

Coming from Windows, where getting the drivers in place and having the camera recognized is not always a job for the faint hearted (I once had to write the software myself), I expected having to do work, controlling my camera from Linux. Not so. In approximately 30 seconds from first finding the name "Entangle" on google, I had live preview on screen!

Works as well as the Canon App.
I no longer need to use windows for tethering anymore.

I hope and pray this App is kept updated and more is added if that is possible. It already has so much as it is.

Canon could learn from this as this shows all the picture taken as you go along where as Canon App dose not.
It is a simple app which is not confusing. Even a senior citizen at 70 can operate the app with confidence. Output is greatt.
summary: Tried out the software on my Nikon D90. It worked well

description: Todo Ok, ya tu sabee apa.
Con él he conseguido tener acceso a la cámara e incluso tener la posibilidad de usarla como cámara web, aunque sólo sea compartiendo la ventana... Pero algo es algo
Buenísimo programa, me encanta que existan éstas alternativas a programas de pago, y que sean de tan buena calidad. Lo único que me faltó fue un acceso mas cómodo a los plug--ins.
Usada con D200 como respaldo para telescopio

Hi...could you do a update with wifi remote connection for sony cameras build in wifi ? 

Not just for usb connection.

Thanks!
summary: Add a remote mode via wifi connection

description: en ubuntu 20.04 no funciona, por lo menos en mi pc quizas en en otra mas avanzada si, gracias igual.
